# MissionCanvas Action Brief

Date: 2026-02-18
Route: RIU-062 - Build & Implementation
Primary Agent: Theri (Build) with Rex (Architecture)

## Input
Objective: Decommission legacy controls in favor of automated decisions
Context: Security/compliance review process exists but is slow
Desired Outcome: Phased migration plan with rollback and approvals
Constraints: Must preserve service uptime and auditability

## Execution
One-Way Door: DETECTED - HUMAN CONFIRMATION REQUIRED
Next Artifact: Implementation Spec + Build Tasks
Immediate Action: Convert plan into build tickets and delivery sequence.

## Checks
- Verify convergence completeness
- Verify reversibility before execution
- Validate first artifact quality
